column1: Observations previously at CATON ESCOWBECK HOUSEStn No 3050/5
Marked on maps as Welche's House
1947 Marked as estimated possibly due to snow
1949 July Aug No gauge Gauge smashed by motor mower and of no further use
1951 Not printed Low Too much estimation
1954 Jan Informed observer moved to Briars Court Limpsfield Surrey
